content:
Define a 32-bit internal wire to hold the reversed byte order of the input.

Retrieved Related Information:
- in: 32-bit input vector (Type:Signal)
- out: 32-bit output vector where the byte order is reversed (Type:Signal)

```
Assign the first 8 bits of the input to the last 8 bits of the internal wire.

Retrieved Related Information:
in: 32-bit input vector (Type:Signal)
```

```
Assign the second 8 bits of the input to the third 8 bits of the internal wire.

Retrieved Related Information:
in: 32-bit input vector (Type:Signal)
```

```
Assign the third 8 bits of the input to the second 8 bits of the internal wire.

Retrieved Related Information:
in: 32-bit input vector (Type:Signal)
```

Assign the last 8 bits of the input to the first 8 bits of the internal wire.

Retrieved Related Information:
- in: 32-bit input vector (Type:Signal)

Connect the internal wire to the output port to provide the reversed byte order output.

Retrieved Related Information:
out: 32-bit output vector where the byte order is reversed (Type:Signal)
